name: UNIVERSITA' de'Medici
overview:
Universita’ de’Medici

The Universita’ de’Medici is a leading school of economics for the education of a new generation of students wanting to specialize in the business of family office, private banking and trusts.

The fields of study include economics, international business law, international law of taxation and trust law.

The five year programm involves onsite and online studies in combination with practice and international experience in an acknowledged licensed trust company with activities in more than 10 countries of economic and legal importance. The education at the Universita’ de’Medici aims to provide students with all the necessary tools to work in the increasingly important field of family office. The institution also provides a number of scholarships to “A” students.

In 1899 the Medici family established a leading international trust company specializing in family offices for high net-worth clients. It has been part of the Medici family’s philanthropic tradition to contribute to the Universita’ de’Medici.

The Medici family sponsors the “none profit” university for centuries dating back to Galileo Galilei in 1609 and runs the university administration.
Regarding on-line courses is built a cooperation with other reputable universities.
